00034 /**
00035  * \file
00036  *         Header file for module for automatically starting and exiting a list of processes.
00037  * \author
00038  *         Adam Dunkels <adam@sics.se>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #ifndef __AUTOSTART_H__
00042 #define __AUTOSTART_H__
00043 
00044 #include "sys/process.h"
00045 
00046 #if ! CC_NO_VA_ARGS
00047 #if AUTOSTART_ENABLE
00048 #define AUTOSTART_PROCESSES(...)                                        \
00049 struct process * const autostart_processes[] = {__VA_ARGS__, NULL}
00050 #else /* AUTOSTART_ENABLE */
00051 #define AUTOSTART_PROCESSES(...)                                        \
00052 extern int _dummy
00053 #endif /* AUTOSTART_ENABLE */
00054 #else
00055 #error "C compiler must support __VA_ARGS__ macro"
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 CLIF extern struct process * const autostart_processes[];
00059 
00060 void autostart_start(struct process * const processes[]);
00061 void autostart_exit(struct process * const processes[]);
00062 
00063 #endif /* __AUTOSTART_H__ */
